text: Kandi iyo basomewe amagambo yacu asobanutse, ubona mu buranga bw’abahakanye (hagaragaramo) kutayishimira, bari hafi gusumira ababasomera amagambo yacu! Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Ese mbabwire ibibi birusha ibyo? Ni umuriro Allah yasezeranyije ba bandi bahakanye, kandi iryo ni ryo herezo ribi.”
